paragraphs.title: Asset Classes with a Mistake
paragraphs.text:
import com.owl.core._
import com.owl.common._

val assetClass = Seq("STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK",
  "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK", "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK", "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK", "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK", "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK","OPTION","FUTURE","STOCK", "STOCK", "FUTURE",
  "SWAP", "OPTION", "STOCK","SWAP", "SWAP", "FUTRS", "STOCK", "OPTION", "FUTURE",
  "OPTION", "STOCK" )

import spark.implicits._
val df = assetClass.toDF("ASSET")
val outliers = new Owl(df).outliersDF("ASSET")
outliers.createOrReplaceTempView("outliers")

msg.data:
import com.owl.core._
import com.owl.common._
assetClass: Seq[String] = List(STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, STOCK, STOCK, FUTURE, SWAP, OPTION, STOCK, SWAP, SWAP, FUTRS, STOCK, OPTION, FUTURE, OPTION, STOCK)
import spark.implicits._
df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [ASSET: string]
 tot: 65  |  lowerB  12.0 
outliers: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [key: string, column: string ... 3 more fields]

key	column	value	prediction	confidence
	ASSET	FUTRS		0

paragraphs.title: State Codes with Mistakes
paragraphs.text:
val l = Seq(
    "MD","PA","DE","PENN","FL","MD","DE", "PA", "FL", "Florida", 
    "md", "Md", "DC", "D.C.", "GA", "NC", "GA", "NYC", "NY", "NY" ,
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL",     
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA",
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", 
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA",
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", 
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", 
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA",
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", 
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA", 
    "MD","PA","DE","NY","FL","GA",
    "AB","AB", "PA", "NC", "SC",       "AB","AB", "PA", "NC", "SC",       
    "AB","AB", "PA", "NC", "SC"
    )

import spark.implicits._
val df1 = l.toDF("STATE_CD")
val outs = new Owl(df1).outliersDF("STATE_CD")
outs.createOrReplaceTempView("outs2")

import spark.implicits._

key	column	value	prediction	confidence

	STATE_CD	DC		0

	STATE_CD	Florida		0

paragraphs.title: Fnames are Unique - Doesn't throw false positive
paragraphs.text:
val b = Seq("kirk","brian","don","dan","kevin","leslie","luce", "leanne", "randy",
"brian","brian","brian","don","don","don","dan", "dan", "kevin",
"brian","brian","brian","don","don","don","dan", "dan", "kevin",
"brian","brian","brian","don","don","don","dan", "dan", "kevin",
"reid","luke","luke","melissa", "" )

import spark.implicits._
val df2 = b.toDF("FNAME")
val outs1 = new Owl(df2).outliersDF("FNAME")
outs1.createOrReplaceTempView("outs1")

msg.data:
b: Seq[String] = List(kirk, brian, don, dan, kevin, leslie, luce, leanne, randy, brian, brian, brian, don, don, don, dan, dan, kevin, brian, brian, brian, don, don, don, dan, dan, kevin, brian, brian, brian, don, don, don, dan, dan, kevin, reid, luke, luke, melissa, "")
import spark.implicits._
df2: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [FNAME: string]
 tot: 41  |  lowerB  0.0 
outs1: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [key: string, column: string ... 3 more fields]

key	column	value	prediction	confidence
	STATE_CD	Md		0
	STATE_CD	DC		0
	STATE_CD	PENN		0
	STATE_CD	D.C.		0
	STATE_CD	Florida		0
